snippet.title: Dreambound: A Mystery BL Visual Novel Preview
snippet.description:
The Kickstarter for Dreambound is live now! 
Use this link to help us make the game: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/gabmag/dreambound?ref=2ricd3

What is Dreambound?
Dreambound is a mystery BL visual novel that follows alongside Noah, a withdrawn artist with the ability to enter dreams in the flesh.

It is the fourth commercial release by Two and a Half Studios, creators of The Divine Speaker.

Music: This Cloud, performed by Luno Music.
